meanings.definition: Having a small hook or hook-like process.
meanings.sent1: The plant had hamulous leaves that helped it cling to the wall.
meanings.sent2: The tiny hamulous thorn on the branch caught my sweater.
meanings.sent3: The hamulous shape of the candy cane made it tricky to eat without poking yourself.
meanings.sent4: Her hamulous wit was sharp and caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent5: The hamulous design of the keychain made it easy to attach to my bag.
